post-edit.name: code-review
post-edit.prompt:
Please review the changes made to {filename} for:
1. Conformance to project specifications in ./specs
2. Code quality and best practices
3. Potential bugs or edge cases
4. Documentation completeness
5. Test coverage requirements

If any issues are found, please describe them and suggest fixes.

post-edit.name: security-audit
post-edit.prompt:
Please perform a security audit of the changes made to {filename}, checking for:
1. Security vulnerabilities
2. Data validation issues
3. Authentication/authorization gaps
4. Secure coding practices
5. Compliance with security requirements in CLAUDE.md

If any security issues are found, please describe them and suggest fixes.
